metadata.title: 7 Pieces Bath Shower Sponge Pouf Loofahs, Includes 4 Pieces Animal Toys Loofahs and 3 Pieces Delicate Mesh Bath Sponge Body Scrubber for Kids Adult Shower

categorization.explanation: The product is a set of bath shower sponges and loofahs, which are commonly used bath accessories. Thus, it fits best under the 'Bath Accessories' subcategory of 'Bath & Shower' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
